data.text: @jim_dickinson And pronounce names correctly which they couldn’t even do before 🤦🏽‍♀️

@jim_dickinson And of course many graduations are no longer run by registry, but instead run by university events departments. Registry were interested in the students. All events are interested in, is the money!
@jim_dickinson Totally agree. My daughter is in this cohort @cardiffuni and is very disappointed

But the brain worms involved in "look how many we can get done in a day" without thinking of the consequences for the bits that matter and the accommodation required... Either it's astonishing thoughtlessness, or dismissal.

You could hold it in an empty warehouse and as long as the family can come at a reasonable price, the gowning is nearby, you cross the stage personally and you haven't booked so many in as to make hotel stays in the area impossible, you win.
It will never stop amazing me quite how easy it is for some universities to misunderstand how important graduation is, and even then which aspects are so important.
